Property.Name: CreatedByUser
Property.sap:label: Created by
Property.sap:quickinfo: Name of Person who Created the Object

Property.Name: CreationDate
Property.sap:label: Created on
Property.sap:quickinfo: Date on which the record was created

Property.Name: PurchaseOrderSubtype
Property.sap:label: Control indicator
Property.sap:quickinfo: Control indicator for purchasing document type

Property.Name: SupplyingPlant
Property.sap:label: Supplying Plant
Property.sap:quickinfo: Supplying (issuing) plant in case of stock transport order

Property.Name: AddressFaxNumber
Property.sap:quickinfo: First Fax No.: Area Code + Number

Property.Name: OrderPriceUnitToOrderUnitNmrtr
Property.sap:label: Quantity Conversion
Property.sap:quickinfo: Numerator for Conversion of Order Price Unit into Order Unit

Property.Name: OrdPriceUnitToOrderUnitDnmntr
Property.sap:label: Quantity Conversion
Property.sap:quickinfo: Denominator for Conv. of Order Price Unit into Order Unit

Property.Name: NetPriceAmount
Property.sap:label: Net Order Price
Property.sap:quickinfo: Net Price in Purchasing Document (in Document Currency)

Property.Name: MultipleAcctAssgmtDistribution
Property.sap:label: Distrib. Indicator
Property.sap:quickinfo: Distribution Indicator for Multiple Account Assignment

Property.Name: PurchaseContractItem
Property.sap:label: Princ.agreement item
Property.sap:quickinfo: Item number of principal purchase agreement

Property.Name: Subcontractor
Property.sap:quickinfo: Supplier to be Supplied/Who is to Receive Delivery

Property.Name: DeliveryAddressID
Property.sap:quickinfo: Manual address number in purchasing document item

Property.Name: DeliveryAddressFullName
Property.sap:label: Full Name
Property.sap:quickinfo: Full name of a party (Bus. Partner, Org. Unit, Doc. address)

Property.Name: DownPaymentAmount
Property.sap:label: Down Payment Amount
Property.sap:quickinfo: Down Payment Amount in Document Currency

Property.Name: PerformancePeriodStartDate
Property.sap:label: Start Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Start Date for Period of Performance

Property.Name: PerformancePeriodEndDate
Property.sap:label: End Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: End Date for Period of Performance

Property.Name: IsDeleted
Property.sap:label: Deletion Indicator
Property.sap:quickinfo: Deletion Indicator: Purchasing Document Account Assignment

Property.Name: MultipleAcctAssgmtDistrPercent
Property.sap:label: Distribution (%)
Property.sap:quickinfo: Distribution percentage in the case of multiple acct assgt

Property.Name: PurgDocNetAmount
Property.sap:label: Net Order Value
Property.sap:quickinfo: Net Order Value in PO Currency

Property.Name: WBSElementExternalID
Property.sap:label: WBS Element
Property.sap:quickinfo: Work Breakdown Structure Element (WBS Element) Edited

Property.Name: RealEstateObject
Property.sap:label: Real Estate Key
Property.sap:quickinfo: Internal Key for Real Estate Object

Property.Name: ConditionToBaseQtyNmrtr
Property.sap:quickinfo: Numerator for Converting to Base UoM

Property.Name: ConditionToBaseQtyDnmntr
Property.sap:quickinfo: Denominator for Converting to Base UoM

Property.Name: ConditionCategory
Property.sap:label: Condition Category
Property.sap:quickinfo: Condition Category (Examples: Tax, Freight, Price, Cost)

Property.Name: IsRelevantForAccrual
Property.sap:quickinfo: Condition is Relevant for Accrual (e.g. Freight)

PropertyValue.String: Gets the header details of all the purchase orders in the system
Gets the header details of all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the header details of a purchase order
Gets the header details such as supplier, company code, currency and so on of a purchase order using the purchase order number provided.
Gets the item details of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system
Gets the item details of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the item details of an item in a purchase order.
Gets the item details such as material, plant, quantity and so on of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided.
Gets the schedule line details of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system
Gets the schedule line details of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the schedule line details of an item in a purchase order.
Gets the schedule line details such as quantity, delivery date and so on of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number and schedule line number provided.
Gets the account assignment details of all the accounting lines of all the items, in all the POs in the system.

Gets the account assignment details of all the accounting lines of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order

Gets the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order, such as GL acocunt, cost center and so on using the purchase order number, item number and serial number of the accounting line provided.
Gets the header texts or notes of all the purchase orders in the system.
Gets the header texts or notes of all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the header texts or notes of a purchase order.

Gets the header note of a particular note type in a purchase order using the purchase order number, text ID that identifies the type of note and language key provided. If the header note is not available in the requested language, then it returns the note in the language in which it was created.
Gets the item texts/notes of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system.
Gets the item texts/notes of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the item texts/notes of a particular note type in a purchase order item.

Gets the item note of a particular note type in a purchase order item using the purchase order number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note and language key provided. If the item note is not available in the requested language, then it returns the note in the language in which it was created.
Gets the pricing details of all the condition lines of all the items, in all the POs in the system.

Gets the pricing details of all the condition lines of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order.

Gets the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order, such as condition value, unit of measure so on using the purchase order number, item number, document condition number, document condition item number, condition sequence number and condition counter in pricing procedure of the condition line provided.
Gets the component details of all the subcontracting items, in all the POs in the system.
Gets the component details of all the subcontracting items, in all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the component details of a particular item in a purchase order.

Gets the component details of a particular subcontracting item in a purchase order such as material, BOM item description, quantity so on using the purchase order number, item number, schedule line counter, reservation item and record type provided.
Gets the item details of all the items in a purchase order.
Gets the item details such as material, plant, quantity so on of all the items in a purchase order using the purchase order number provided.
Gets all the header notes or texts of a purchase order.
Gets all the header notes or texts of a purchase order using the purchase order number provided.
Adds an item to a purchase order

Adds an item to a purchase order using the purchase order number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" in the request body along with details like material, plant, quantity and so on.
Adds or creates a note or text to a purchase order.

Adds or creates a note or text to a purchase order using the purchase order number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" in the request body along with details like text object id, language and texts to be added.
Gets the account assignment details of all the accounting lines of an item in a purchase order.
Gets the account assignment details of all the accounting lines of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided.
Gets all the item notes of an item in a purchase order
Gets all the item notes of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided.
Gets the pricing details of all the conditions of an item in a purchase order.
Gets the pricing details of all the conditions of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided.
Gets all the schedule lines of an item in a purchase order.
Gets all the schedule lines of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided.
Gets the header details of an item in a purchase order.
Gets the header details of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided.
Adds the schedule line details to an item in a purchase order.

Adds the schedule line details such as quantity, delivery date so on to an item in a purchase order, using the purchase order number and item number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchasingDocument" and item number "PurchasingDocumentItem" in the request body.
Adds the pricing condition details to an item in a purchase order.

Adds the pricing condition details such as condition type, condition value, Currency and so on to an item in a purchase order, using the purchase order number and item number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.
Adds the account assignment details to an item in a purchase order.

Adds the account assignment details such as Cost center, GL account, WBS element and so on to an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.
Adds or creates a note or text to an item in a purchase order.

Adds or creates a note or text to an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem", in the request body along with details like text object id, language and texts to be added.
Gets all the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase order.

Gets all the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, schedule line number, reservation number and record type provided.
Adds the subcontracting component details to a schedule line of an item in a purchase order.

Adds the subcontracting component details such as material, requirement date, quantity so on to a schedule line of an item in a purchase order, using the purchase order number, item number and schedule line number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder", item number "PurchaseOrderItem" and schedule line number "ScheduleLine" in the request body.
Updates the header details of a purchase order.
Updates the header details of a purchase order using the purchase order number provided.
Creates a new purchase order.
Creates a new purchase order with the header and item details passed in the request body.
This operation is currently not supported.
This operation is currently not supported.
Adds an item to a purchase order.

Adds an item with details like material, quantity, price unit, and so on to a purchase order using the purchase order number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" in the request body.
Updates the item details of an item in a purchase order.
Updates the item details of an item in a purchase order, using the purchase order number, and item number provided.
Deletes an item in a purchase order.
Deletes an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number and item number provided.
Adds new text or note to a purchase order.

Adds new text types or note data to the purchase order for example header text, terms of delivery, so on using the purchase order number provided. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" in the request body.
Updates the header text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order.
Updates the header text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order using the purchase order number, text ID that identifies the type of text and language key provided.
Deletes the header text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order.
Deletes the header text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order using the purchase order number, text ID that identifies the type of text and language key provided.
Adds a new accounting line to an item in a purchase order.
Adds a new accounting line to an item in a purchase order. It is mandatory to provide the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.
Updates the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order.
Updates the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order, using the purchase order number, item number and serial number of the accounting line provided.
Deletes an accounting line of an item in a purchase order.
Deletes a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order, using the purchase order number, item number and serial number of the accounting line provided.
Adds new text or note to a purchase order item.

Adds new text or note to a purchase order item for example item text, delivery text. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.
Updates the item text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order item.
Updates the item text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order item using the purchase order number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of text and language key provided.
Deletes the item text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order item.
Deletes the item text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order item using the purchase order number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of text and language key provided.
Adds a new condition line to an item in a purchase order.

Adds a new condition line to an item in a purchase order. Condition details like condition value, currency, order price unit and so on can be added. It is mandatory to provide the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.
Updates the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order.

Updates the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, document condition number, document condition item number, condition sequence number and condition counter in pricing procedure of the condition line provided.
Deletes the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order.

Deletes the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, document condition number, document condition item number, condition sequence number and condition counter in pricing procedure of the condition line provided.
Adds a new schedule line to an item in a purchase order.
Adds a new schedule line to an item in a purchase order. It is mandatory to provide the purchase order number "PurchasingDocument" and item number "PurchasingDocumentItem" in the request body.
Updates the schedule line details of a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order.
Updates the schedule line details of a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, and sequence number of the schedule line provided.
Deletes the schedule line of an item in a purchase order.
Deletes a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number and sequence number of the schedule line provided.
Adds a subcontracting component line to an item in a purchase order.
Adds a subcontracting component line to an item in a purchase order. It is mandatory to provide the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.
Updates the subcontracting component details of a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order.

Updates the subcontracting component details of a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, sequence number of the schedule line, reservation item number and record type provided.
Deletes the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase order.

Deletes the subcontracting component details of a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, sequence number of the schedule line, reservation item number and record type provided.
